fields.name: Exodus 14:14
fields.value: 14 The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.

fields.name: Leviticus 26:1-13
fields.value:
1 Ye shall make you no idols nor graven image, neither rear you up a standing image, neither shall ye set up any image of stone in your land, to bow down unto it: for I am the Lord your God.

2 Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the Lord.

3 If ye walk in my statutes, and keep my commandments, and do them;

4 Then I will give you rain in due season, and the land shall yield her increase, and the trees of the field shall yield their fruit.

5 And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

6 And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.

7 And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.

8 And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.

9 For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.

10 And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.

11 And I set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.

12 And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.

13 I am the Lord your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, that ye should not be their bondmen; and I have broken the bands of your yoke, and made you go upright.

fields.name: Numbers 6:26
fields.value: 26 The LORD lift up his countenance upon thee, and give thee peace.

fields.name: Psalm 4:8
fields.value: 8 I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.

fields.name: Psalm 29:11
fields.value: 11 The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.

fields.name: Psalm 37:11
fields.value: 11 But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

fields.name: Psalm 37:37
fields.value: 11 Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.

fields.name: Psalm 72:3
fields.value: 3 The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.

fields.name: Psalm 72:7
fields.value: 11 In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.

fields.name: Psalm 85:8
fields.value: 8 I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.

fields.name: Psalm 85:10
fields.value: 10 Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

fields.name: Psalm 119:165
fields.value: 165 Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

fields.name: Proverbs 11:12
fields.value: 12 He that is void of wisdom despiseth his neighbour: but a man of understanding holdeth his peace.

fields.name: Proverbs 12:20
fields.value: 20 Deceit is in the heart of them that imagine evil: but to the counsellors of peace is joy.

fields.name: Proverbs 16:7
fields.value: 7 When a man's ways please the LORD, he maketh even his enemies to be at peace with him.

fields.name: Proverbs 16:28
fields.value: 28 Even a fool, when he holdeth his peace, is counted wise: and he that shutteth his lips is esteemed a man of understanding.

fields.name: Ecclesiastes 3:8
fields.value: 8 A time to love, and a time to hate; a time of war, and a time of peace.

fields.name: Isaiah 26:3
fields.value: 3 Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

fields.name: Isaiah 26:12
fields.value: 12 LORD, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

fields.name: Isaiah 48:22
fields.value: 22 There is no peace, saith the LORD, unto the wicked.

fields.name: Isaiah 54:13
fields.value: 13 And all thy children shall be taught of the LORD; and great shall be the peace of thy children.

fields.name: Isaiah 57:2
fields.value: 2 He shall enter into peace: they shall rest in their beds, each one walking in his uprightness.

fields.name: Isaiah 57:19
fields.value: 19 I create the fruit of the lips; Peace, peace to him that is far off, and to him that is near, saith the LORD; and I will heal him.

fields.name: Jeremiah 29:11
fields.value: 11 For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil, to give you an expected end.

fields.name: Luke 1:78-79
fields.value:
78 Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,

79 To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.

fields.name: John 14:27
fields.value: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

fields.name: John 16:33
fields.value: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

fields.name: John 20:21
fields.value: 21 Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.

fields.name: Romans 5:1
fields.value: 1 Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ:

fields.name: Romans 8:6
fields.value: 6 For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.

fields.name: Romans 14:17
fields.value: 17 For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.

fields.name: Galatians 5:22
fields.value: 22 But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

fields.name: Philippians 4:7
fields.value: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

fields.name: James 3:18
fields.value: 18 And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace.

fields.name: Revelation 6:4
fields.value: 4 And there went out another horse that was red: and power was given to him that sat thereon to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another: and there was given unto him a great sword.

fields.name: Study
fields.value: Covenant of Peace (The Ten Commandments)

fields.name: Numbers 25:10-13
fields.value:
10 And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

11 Phinehas, the son of Eleazar, the son of Aaron the priest, hath turned my wrath away from the children of Israel, while he was zealous for my sake among them, that I consumed not the children of Israel in my jealousy.

12 Wherefore say, Behold, I give unto him my covenant of peace:

13 And he shall have it, and his seed after him, even the covenant of an everlasting priesthood; because he was zealous for his God, and made an atonement for the children of Israel.

fields.name: Ezekiel 37:26
fields.value: 26 Moreover I will make a covenant of peace with them; it shall be an everlasting covenant with them: and I will place them, and multiply them, and will set my sanctuary in the midst of them for evermore.

fields.name: Malachi 2:5-6
fields.value:
5 My covenant was with him of life and peace; and I gave them to him for the fear wherewith he feared me, and was afraid before my name.

6 The law of truth was in his mouth, and iniquity was not found in his lips: he walked with me in peace and equity, and did turn many away from iniquity.

fields.name: Summary
fields.value: God promises us to give us peace and a clear mind, when we surrender and obey Him.
